ad_text: Bin There Dump That-Sarasota/Bradenton Sponsored This Delivery Expert position is a full time postion Monday-Friday with occasional Saturday Driver will deliver and pick up small roll-off dumpsters, tarp loads and dump them at local transfer stations and landfills. Vehicles are medium duty trucks such as F550 / F650, does NOT require a CDL. We train all drivers, if you have driven a box truck, tow truck, or long trailer, AND you enjoy providing AWESOME service -- you have the skills needed! $16 per hour starting pay after training pay will increase FULL-TIME · SARASOTA, FLORIDA Delivery Truck Driver Apply now
